title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app 10-C
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app 10-C
State Regulations
(cf. Part 458)
(Name of Municipality or Cooperative)
CERTIFICATE OF COMPLIANCE
Provision of Electric Service to Buildings Subject to
the

State Energy Conservation Construction Code

The undersigned certifies that the building(s)
at ____________ (Location)
is (are) or will be in compliance with the New York State

Energy Conservation Construction Code, promulgated as regulations of the New

York State Energy Office in 9 NYCRR Parts
7810
through
7815, not later than 30
days after time of occupancy of the new residential building(s) or 30 days
after completion of expansion of electric service for the purpose of providing
electric heat to any addition, alteration or renovation of the existing
building(s) which materially increases its (their) heating or cooling
requirements. It is understood that electric service will not be connected or
will be disconnected if, upon inspection, the structure is found not to be in
compliance with the conditions set forth. The undersigned certifies that a properly executed copy of this
certificate will be delivered to the owner prior to closing, in the case of new
construction, or in the case of expansion of existing electric service as
specified above for the purpose of providing electric heat, on completion of
the electric work; and agrees that any successor in title shall be deemed a
beneficiary of the undertakings described in this certificate. Dated: ____________
______________
Signature of Builder or Contractor

Dated: ____________
______________
Signature of Representative of

Municipal Electric Department, Building

Code Enforcement Inspector or

Qualified Representative of
the Municipal Government

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app
10-C
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
